Package org.opencastproject.event.comment

Class EventCommentServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
org.opencastproject.event.comment.EventCommentServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventCommentService
public class EventCommentServiceImpl extends Object implements EventCommentService
Implements permanent storage for event comments.
